summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 FORD TAURUS.  WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 35 MPH, THE AIR CONDITIONING UNIT FAILED.  THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED ON THE INSTRUMENT PANEL.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER AND THEY STATED THAT THE FAILURE WAS RELATED TO THE BLOWER MOTOR.  THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 47,300.
